document.docAuthor: Nguyen, Tung T., Nguyen, Anh D., Tran, Binh T. T. & Blakemore, Robert J.
document.masterDocTitle: A comprehensive checklist of earthworm species and subspecies from Vietnam (Annelida: Clitellata: Oligochaeta: Almidae, Eudrilidae, Glossoscolecidae, Lumbricidae, Megascolecidae, Moniligastridae, Ocnerodrilidae, Octochaetidae)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: A comprehensive checklist of earthworm species and subspecies from Vietnam (Annelida: Clitellata: Oligochaeta: Almidae, Eudrilidae, Glossoscolecidae, Lumbricidae, Megascolecidae, Moniligastridae, Ocnerodrilidae, Octochaetidae)

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Metaphire houlleti—
Sims & Easton 1972 : 238
;
Blakemore 2007a : 48
; Blakemore 2008b .

Metaphire campanulata—
Sims & Easton 1972 ; 238;
Blakemore 2007a : 48
, treated as synonym of
Metaphire houlleti ( Perrier, 1872 )
.

subSubSection.paragraph:
Examined material.
25 C and 18 A ( CTU-EW.006.06 ) natural forest, Cat Tien NP , Tan Phu , Dong Nai ,
13/ 10/2013
, coll. Le Van Nhan
;
22 C ( CTU-EW.006.02 ) Phung Hiep , Can Tho ,
9/10/2009
, coll. Ngo Thi Ngan
;
13C, 4 A ( SORC-V.129.01 ) deciduous forest, Ealop , Dak Lak ,
18/10/1989
, coll. Huynh Thi Kim Hoi
;
15 C and 5 A ( CTU-EW.018.01 ) Nam Cat Tien , Tan Phu , Dong Nai ,
13/10/2013
, coll. Le Van Nhan
;
11 C ( CTU-EW.018.05 ) Cu Lao Duyen , Cho Moi , An Giang , 9/2009, coll. Ho Minh Thuan
.

Distribution. Cosmopolitan species, occurring in India , Thailand , Cambodia , Laos , Myanmar , Taiwan , Singapore , China , Australia , USA ( Gate 1939 , 1972 ; Easton 1982 ; Thai & Do 1989 ; Thai & Samphon 1991 ; Shen & Yeo 2005 ; Shen et al. 200 5).

Remarks. Gates (1939) noted that the original home of the species is probably somewhere a region comprising eastern Myanmar and Thailand . The species has been known in Vietnam as two different species,
Pheretima houlleti
and
Pheretima campanulata
.
